reviews.review:
My teamate pulled me off a meat hook infront of the killer. The killer promptly put me back on the meat hook then a sky spider killed me.

8/10

Genuinely terrifying, with an engaging leveling system for both survivors and killers. I really enjoy customizing my characters! I haven't seen bad glitches myself (just the occasional immersion-breaking graphical glitch), but I've heard of some pretty major ones, so do be cautious and document anything the devs need to know about. While this could use a bit more polish this is still one of the most engaging multiplayer experiences I've had in a while, and nails the "asymmetric" multiplayer experience.

EDIT: So in my previous version of this review, I said I hadn't seen much toxicity in the player base. I kinda take that back--while it's still probably not the worst community I've seen, yeah, it's there. Sometimes you'll get people arguing with you in the end-game chat about choices you made, as both a survivor and a killer. You can choose not to engage, and at least it's not over voice chat, but it's definitely annoying. (I highly recommend just giving out a few GGs, maybe a compliment if you notice someone playing really well, and moving on. It's not worth getting caught up in the arguments.)

Also one thing I will say that I've experienced in the last year is that the devs of this game are really, really good at supporting the game and trying to incorporate player feedback without hurting the balance of the game. They don't always get stuff right (who does?) and the game can definitely feel pretty janky at times--but you can tell that they really care about the quality of the game, and prioritize that over money-making schemes, which can be a trap in a lot of AAA multiplayer games. This definitely isn't a game for everyone, but if you like PVP and want a game that really feels like a horror game while also being multiplayer, I still think this is the best on the market.

Собственно, ориентация разработчиков на выжимание денег из пользователя и полное игнорирование старых и изрядно надоевших проблем и является основной проблемой игры. Вместо того, чтоб наконец создать фиксированные серверы и таким образом уменьшить количество лагов, решить проблемы внезапного вылета из игры, наконец начать банить читеров и мамкиных оскорблятелей, которых весьма много в коммьюнити игры, разработчики в новой версии игры ввели ... барабанная дробь... магазин за реальную валюту.
This game is in the worst state its ever been, don't waste your time.

It's basically become a collection game on rails because the perks nullify the basic stategy and mechanics of the game. It's pretty boring once you play it for a couple days. You literally just take turns 'saving' players off of a hook, until its your turn. As killer you just run around and grab the guy who just got off the hook, hook them again and run to the nearest player you see. Used to be good, but overpowered perks make it not worth playing.

Per giocare un po con gli amici a qualcosa di diverso ci sta.
Ma se dovete giocare in modo serio come me, lo sconsiglio vivamente a tutti.
Il gioco in se è un Bug, non ci sono server dedicati perche l'host è sempre il Killer, quindi riuscirà a colpirvi anche quando sarà dall'altra parte del pallet perche lui ha il vantaggio e se vuole, potrà Lag Switchare per vincere la partita in modo easy, e voi penserete: "Beh basta uscire dalla partita".
EHH invece no caro mio, se uscirai dalla partita perderai due pip (progresso del rank) e derankerai di continuo.
Fatemi pensare se c'è altro..AH SI
Se avvierete una partita con degli oggetti e il gioco crasherà perderete AUTOMATICAMENTE tutti gli oggetti che avetate impostato.
Gli sviluppatori invece di investire soldi per renderlo un gioco decente con Servers dedicati e rimozione dei Bugs, pensano a mettere skins €€€ A PAGAMENTO €€€ e organizzare eventi (che poi, tra parentesi, che senso ha organizzare eventi se il gioco è completamente rotto?)
A voi la scelta.

интересеая игра.
好玩

说老实话自从这个版本上线之后，我玩人从来没有出去过，只能走地窖局。偶尔会碰到屠夫不会玩的，但是呢，如果屠夫稍微一认真，人基本上最多开门二跑，我说的是萌新屠夫这类。然后是屠夫，我玩屠夫以前带吞噬希望局局被拆，现在呢，如果没有厄咒毁灭的话人一直修不管是什么图腾，结果就是四杀。我玩屠夫跟砍个bot似的，甚至可以一边听歌一边玩，少了心里博弈。所以这款游戏不建议萌新入坑，这游戏可以说是已经完全毁了，就等倒闭，制作组是SZ，建议人类被挂树上去之后就直接恶灵献祭，屠夫每献祭一个人，会使屠夫获得屠龙宝刀一刀999，而且全图透视60秒。智障制作组

我只是一个玩了一百多个小时的普通玩家，只是最近的改动确实让许多玩家有些无法接受。
2.0版本上线后，屠夫被增强，人类一削再削。
打个比方来说，双红的夹子屠夫完全没有办法打，奔跑不恢复疲劳，而且加上游戏开始以来的刷血点及改档的玩家，极度破坏游戏体验。
我相信BE在平衡性方面下了不少功夫，也在修复游戏的各种bug(滑稽).
屠夫的上手难度已经够低了，还在不断加强，萌新屠夫可以轻易的做到4杀，但是萌新人类却没法轻易做到生还。
然而就像制作者所说: I think we did a pretty good job so far. 我也希望或者说在此建议，BE能够架设服务器，因为这个游戏自从出来以后，就一直是以屠夫的服务器为游戏服务器的玩法，这样的弊端就是屠夫恶意拔插，破坏人类玩家游戏体验。
再来就是改档和刷血点的玩家，大多数水平普通，但是奈何改档和刷血点，配件极好，弥补了技术的不足，而且这类玩家可以长期利用配件来影响游戏平衡性，这还怎么好好玩？
希望黎明杀机越做越好，这是我玩了这么久游戏里玩的时间算比较长的一款游戏，虽然问题很多，但还是给好评。

Dead by Daylight is not worth dealing with the toxic ill behaved players in trials (matches).
Whether you are a Killer or Survivor the gameplay is just un-fun because of the people you play with and against.
There isn't enough alleviation from the poor behavior on both sides of the fence.

I've never turned away from a game to the point of not even asking for a refund but instead just having steam remove it from my account. This was a first for me and I didn't even think twice about the decision.
It's seriously that overwhelming. It's either some Toxic Survivor or Toxic Killer; and there is no break from it.

Does it make it right? No.
Does it make it fair? No.
It makes every trial an unnecessary ball ache.

Definitely buyers remorse.

And...I suggest you tread that DLC sales pitch very carefully.
I purchased 1 because I wasn't sure about Dead by Daylight. I am very grateful that I did purchase just  the one while the steam summer sale was on. I'd feel rightfully upset had I done otherwise.

While not dealing with the absolutely horrendous 2010 WoW addicts level of toxicity this particular group of gamers harbor, Dead by Daylight itself doesn't offer much.
Definitely not enough to overcome the horrible community.

The overall game is very simple. It's mostly comprised of skill-shots. No reticule, and lots of indirect suggestion. Nothing is laid out in plain sight for you. It's a game of cat and mice not mouse, mice.
Some might say this makes trials more versatile because the rules are not lacking but, very simple thus not being overly restricting so it allows for some unique interaction between killers and survivors.

Survivors need to repair generators to power an exit gate and leave while not being caught and put on a meat hook by the Killer.
Killers need to chase and catch Survivors to sacrifice on hooks to the entity so they can't escape.
That's it.

However because the game is so simple there's nothing really to look forward to.
It maintains a huge level of RNG. Too much to really be competitive.
Because perks, items and relics (all objects in game that augment your character and their abilities) are all earned through an RNG system. This DOES prevent some forming of a META because the game will, simply by design, occasionally force both Killers and Survivors to play differently becasue the access they have to these skills and items are not reliably available.

While I understand this may not be a direct reason it's not as enjoyable to play through regardless. I've always been generally against METAs as they tend to reduce a game down to mind numbing monotony. I don't think this is a good approach to that--and make no mistake there is a form of META but, it's not as persistent as it is with other games where skills and abilities are absolute and can reliably be accessed.

I've got a pretty nice build, Why does that need to be subject to RNG?
The game is  mechanically flexible enough between Killers and Survivors during trials (matches) that this is an unnecessary inhibitor to making builds.
Looking at it as a whole, Dead by Daylight ranges erratically between skills that are useless and those that are clearly broken or too favorable to those that have them based on the emphasis of the objectives in trials. There's is a middle ground but this doesn't mean the under utilized and over utilized skills aren't at extremes in both utility and numbers.

All this being said, I don't recommend Dead by Daylight:
1. The community is not worth engaging with at any price.
2. Dead By Daylight lacks a great amount of depth in gameplay.
3. For as much success Dead By Daylight has experienced and the number of reliable DLC purchased. The user experience should be above what it is, which is poor. This includes how your community interacts with itself.
4. Dead by Daylight doesn't have permanent servers.

*This review will not change.
Thanks for reading.

Hey vous vous faites farmer sur fortnite ? CoD ? (d'ailleurs le prochain est bien mauvais). Vous êtes bronze/silver sur kikoo LoL ou Dotache ?
ou encore plein d'autres jeux, ce jeu est fait pour vous !

En tant que surv vous avez le droit de courir et heu rien d'autre, vous pouvez pas communiquer avec les autres joueurs
les surv sont tous muets, surement des anciens enfants sauvages élevés par des zèbres.
Vous êtes moins rapide que les tueurs ( oui oui même le clown de 120-160kg, ou qu'un mec qui porte une tronçonneuse).
Vous pouvez vous défendre en passant à travers une fenetre (et quand même vous faire toucher) ou en étourdissant le tueur pendant 2-3sec ! avec des plaques de bois super non ?
Les hitbox du jeu sont à vomir, (freddy risque de vous toucher 8/10 alors que vous êtes de l'autre côté de la plaque, il fait 1m75 mais il a la portée d'un bus avec ses griffes).
vous passez à côté d'un piège des fois vous êtes absorbé dedans, les pièges sont égalements quasi impossible à voir, il y a bien un atout pour les voirs mais il sert à rien du tout, c'est seulement dans un rayon et ça détecte aussi les totems, ça a un CD et ça met pas les pièges/totems en surbrillance, c'est aussi utile qu'un porte manteau sur la banquise. 
En parlant des totems, il y a un tueur qui veut vous tuer mais vous détruisez les totems délicatement, il faudrait pas être vilain !

Et là si vous êtes mauvais avec un clavier/manette, vous avez un QI de 80 ou même vous avez plus de bras ? pas de problème le tueur est fait pour VOUS !

En tant que tueur vous êtes l'host de la partie, vous avez une co de roumain ? pas grave c'est les surv qui vont lagger pas vous
Vous pouvez perdre en tant que tueur si jamais vous vous absentez pour diverses raisons et encore avec l'atout qui one shot quand les générateurs sont tous activés
vous pouvez encore gagner :)
Vous voulez vous amuser à pourrir la partie d'un joueur ? Simple vous le pourchasser en boucle il pourra rien faire, camping/tunneling vous pouvez antijeu apparemment c'est autorisé
Les surv peuvent rien vous faire à part vous étourdir 2-3sec avec une plaque assez simple à éviter, ou vous aveugler peu de temps avec une lampe torche.
Et comme ça vous pouvez vous sentir super bon, bon je vous rassure vous l'êtes pas mais au moins vous pouvez avoir le sentiment de l'être.


Le jeu est bon mais les dev sont des abrutis, ça buff les tueurs et nerf les surv qui sont déjà des victimes, si ça continue on va avoir un tueur qui se déplace sur la map n'importe où,
et qui one shot ( ho wait y a déjà billy et la nurse ) bientôt les tueurs vont gagner en appuyant sur une touche au pif, c'est magique
Keep your money... playing survivor is just pure insanity. Can't barely win a game now with so many OP killers and the queues for them are not worth it.

This is one of the greatest games I've ever played.

Pros:
1. They put time and effort into this game with new perks, killers, and survivors.
2. Each killer has a unique ability and every survivor there own playstyle
3. You can play forever and never get bored.
4. By far a great game

Mid:
1. Toxic/Nice Community memebers :)
2. bugs are kinda common only if you play for a while
3. To many survivor nerfs :/

Cons:
1. Devs used to cause lots of bugs and created awful perks never used (Now fixed hopefully)
2. To many exploits in the game
3. Reporting someone feels like your wasting time in the games plus it feels like they never ban the people who hack and hold the game hostage and use a bot to monitor it (lets the game detect for hacks instead of checking reports).


Still By Far An Amazing Game
Much better than what it used to be.

Premetto che ultimamente ho giocato parecchio al buon DBD, e devo dire che il gioco in sè è stata una grande idea, unica nel suo genere. Il gioco lo posseggo più o meno dall'uscita, quando ancora erano presenti solo i primi 3 killer (Cacciatore, Spettro e Mandriano) e devo dire che l'evoluzione non ha avuto una grandissima piega.. Hanno rilasciato parecchi DLC da allora, ma non sono d'accordo con metterli tutti a pagamento, avrei preferito pagarlo un pò di più ma avere tutti i Dlc sbloccati considerando che come gioco è molto ripetitivo, se non per le diverse strategie su come affrontare un killer.. Inoltre, lo trovo parecchio diverso da quando lo giocavo i primi tempi, e purtroppo, non in meglio.
Il Killer ormai si ritrova avvantaggiato sotto tutti i punti di vista, Nelle lobby prepartita, può vedere quali vestiti (di solito se vedono vestiti di rank alto escono dalla lobby, costringendoti a rifare tutta la lobby da capo invitando nuovamente i tuoi amici, nonostante stavate già insieme in una lobby pre-prepartita) e anche ciò che si porta con se, permettendogli di cambiare la moltitudine di Perks (tra l'altro trasferibili tutte in tutti i vari killer) per affrontare al meglio i sopravvissuti, molte volte mettendosi Perks "cancro", che vanno a distrruggere qualsiasi tipo di tattica dei vari sopravvissuti : faccio un esempio, ormai qualsiasi killer usa un perk chiamato "Barbecue e Chilli" che appeso un sopravvissuto, vengono rilevati per 4 secondi tutti i sopravvissuti oltre 40 metri dal gancio, ora diciamo che il metodo per contrastarlo c'è, basta stare vicino a lui o comunque sotto i 40 metri, ma facendoti perdere tempo prezioso per riparare i generatori più lontani.. Fosse solo questo alla fine sarebbe anche ok, ma purtroppo esistono altri perk cancrogeni, che uniti ad altri lo diventano ancora di più, come "Rovina", che fa perdere a volte decine di minuti su alcune mappe, in quanto impedisce (o meglio rallenta) la riparazione dei generatori, e su un gioco come questo il tempo è una cosa preziosa se si vuole raggiungere un obiettivo.. non sto qui ad elencare tutte le abilità cancro, anche se ce ne sono parecchie (Caduta di Franklin, Vocazione dell'infermiera ect.).. inoltre, quando si insegue un sopravvissuto, dopo un pò ti si attiva un perk aggiuntivo chiamato "sete di sangue" che aumenta ulteriormente la velocità di movimento del killer, cosa già superiore ed anche di molto.. In aggiunta si mettono alcuni giocatori ad usare piccoli escamotage, per cercare di rendere le partite infernali, come quando rimani ultimo con il tuo compagno per terra sanguinante, il killer non lo appenderà per cercarvi e uccidervi non permettondovi l'uscita dalla botola, e come se non bastasse, alcuni killer sono troppo potenti e sbilanciati rispetto ad altri, basti vedere Lether Face o The Nurse, in quanto il primo super veloce e con attacchi che mandano in stato di fin di vita al primo colpo, ed il secondo impossibile in certi casi da evitare e con un teletrasporto in grado di attraversare qualsiasi cosa e colpirti al volo, rendendo inutilizzabili, le varie barricate sparse per la mappa.. Per non parlare dei trucchetti che usano i killer quando cerchi di scappare attraverso il Perk "Colpo Decisivo" (che ti permette attraverso un test abilità, di scappare se riuscito alla presa del killer) semplicemente buttandoti a terra e riprendendoti continuamente fino ad arrivare al gancio, per non permettere al sopravvissuto di far attivare in tempo il perk, rendendolo inutilizzabile, sprecando una competenza usabile già solo una volta per partita. Conclusione, il mio giudizio è negativo per lo stato attuale del gioco, in quanto se ti piace giocare da sopravvissuto, sarai costretto a perdere la maggior parte delle partite, anche con una squadra ben organizzata, in quanto i sopravvissuti, non hanno abilità "cancro" come il killer. Sconsigliato. 
P.S. Se siete "Fan boi" so tutto io, inutile che commentate, in quanto la maggior parte dell'utenza si lamenta che ormai l'assassino ha già il lavoro fatto, grazie a perk di abilità lettura dell'aura, graffi ect, non serve nemmeno che si spreca a cercarli in quanto il gioco lo fa già da solo.


UPDATE 2.3.0

Oggi è uscito ufficialmente il nuovo update.. che dire peggio di prima, killer sempre più avvantaggiato in animazioni e perk, e sopravvissuti sempre più svantaggiati, potevo capirlo se si giocasse sempre in squadra, ma è un gioco nato per singole persone che cercano altri con il matchmaking, e risulta impossibile vincere con gente random (Rage quit, Camper, Body Block), continuo a sconsigliarlo, salvatevi i soldi piuttosto, che almeno quelli li potete salvare.
PRETTY GOOD JOB SO FAR
An awesome game, the whole concept is really awesome and I love the gameplay. The game is even better with friends >:)

Как любой комментарий или обзор, это суровое имхо.
Эта игра по-своему уникальна. Как двуликий Янус. Её разработчики очень хороши в плане визуальной составляющей, дизайна персонажей и карт, атмосферы (особенно с последними главами), наполнения, анимаций действий и убийств, истории мира и его лора (тут вообще одна из лучших идей за всё время с Сущностью, возрождением после смерти, жертвоприношениями, безвыходностью и прочими вкусняшками). И эти же разработчики плохи в технической части (баги, лаги, глюки, бесконечные загрузки и легендарные хиты, достающие тебя через окно, когда ты уже отбежал на 4 метра, либо топоры, прилетающие в спину, когда ты уже давно завернул за угол) и просто ужасны в плане игрового баланса. Причем речь даже не о вечном споре о том, кто слишком бафнутый: выжившие или киллеры. Тут дело в ином: разработчики придумали механику игры, а потом сами же как-то взяли и махнули на нее рукой, позволив группам сурвов в голосе участвовать в рейтинге наравне с рандомами, никак не выделяя и не оповещая Киллера о том, что против него команда. А дальше стали "балансировать" сломанную игру. В итоге получился бред, потому что четыре рандома и команда в голосе - это, как говорится, две большие разницы, и эффект разных патчей, изменений и нововведений на эти две группы кардинально различается. Подкрутив что-то у сурвов, разрабы сильно усиливают команды, киллеры начинают возмущаться, их резко бафают или меняют (или "нерфят" сурвов), жизнь у обычных рандомных игроков становится печальной, они тоже начинают плакать, и процесс идёт по бесконечному кругу, бессмысленному и беспощадному. Выход, казалось бы, элементарный: разделите эти две группы. Киллер просто-напросто должен получать оповещение, если против него команда, и иметь возможность подготовиться (я уже молчу про какие-то баффы к его перкам). А разделив, уже балансируйте себе на здоровье, тут хоть будет смысл. Но вряд ли это когда-либо реализуют...
Отдельно доставляет "логика" определённых действий. К примеру, разработчики ввели наказание за дисконнект из матча (намеренный или случайный), мотивируя это тем, что подобные действия сказываются на игровом опыте других игроков и мешают тем наслаждаться игрой, снижая шансы на победу (или типа того). Вроде хорошо. Однако как насчёт, к примеру, тиммейтов, которые фармят тебя по-чёрному, снимая с крюка под носом у киллера без одолженного времени или, что еще хуже, вообще специально привлекая внимание уходящего маньяка перед тем, как зафармить твою тушку (да-да, иммерсивные Клодетты, это в первую очередь к вам относится)? Что насчёт киллеров, которые всю игру валяют тебя на земле, пока ты просто не помрешь согласно таймеру? Как насчёт вышеупомянутых групп в войсе, которые тусят на невысоких рангах, тибэггают и издеваются над новенькими неопытными еще киллерами, которые еще только учатся играть? Я не буду упоминать кемпинг крюков и дальнейший туннелинг с красным мори (тут еще можно скрипя зубами сослаться на игровую механику или наличие у киллера ритуала или достижения). Как насчёт всего этого? Это каким-то образом должно меня веселить и способствовать получению приятного игрового опыта? Это не мешает мне наслаждаться игрой? Почему это не банится и не наказывается? Вы реально считаете, что дисконнект портит игру намного сильнее, чем фармомрази (давайте называть вещи своими именами), кемперящий в кустах киллер с красным мори, три минуты валяния на земле лицом в грязи или фул команда в голосе, что ты поймешь уже тогда, кода будет поздно? Ну правда?
В-общем, что я хочу сказать: игра никогда не была бы куплена, знай я всё это заранее. Как ни парадоксально, ибо мне она очень сильно нравится (в первых предложениях сказано, почему). Вот такие дела. Если вы еще не играли, найдите что-то более адекватное, чтобы не приходилось потом разбивать себе лицо фэйспалмами, глядя на очередные "балансирования" многострадальной сломанной игровой механики или на очередной "бесконечный" загрузочный экран..

I really like this game...but there are a few things wrong with it.  As a killer, you can be out-done by simple, goofy, mind-numbing gimmicks like pallet running.  This is where someone just runs in circles for minutes on end.  It ruins any fun of the game.  I'm not sure how/why the devs don't do something about this.  Anyway, I wouldn't buy this game until you read about updates to things like "pallet looping" or "pallet running."

有时候我真的特别好奇杀机官方到底是一群什么样的人组成的，聪明起来让人敬佩，愚蠢起来让人生畏，首先杀机一年4次更新屠夫和人类，一个新DLC卖28块钱，游戏玩法，屠夫设计，人类设计几乎就没有什么问题，偶尔有点bug那都很正常的事怕什么，而且每年各种活动，各种更新层出不穷，怎么看怎么是个优秀的好团队才能做出来的游戏，结果呢，就一个人屠平衡的问题，6年了没有结果，更新了无数次了，基本没有解决过本质问题，其实这个问题有多难改，要我说简单的不得了，首先第一步，把组排玩家和单排玩家的游戏难度划分，本来组排和单排就强度差八千里，为什么不给组排玩家加难度是不是，组排电机150秒一台，板子更少，屠夫移动速度加快，什么办法都行啊，只要一划分立马没有什么狗屁速修问题了，修机快一定是因为合修更容易，组排一般有语音，所以导致了屠夫抱怨修机的问题，同时给组排加一个标识，把接不接组排的选择权给屠夫自己，立马啥问题都没有了。第二守尸针对问题，更好办，人类可以在钩子上选择随机移动到别的钩子上去，地下室的钩子除外，直接没问题了啊，管他是皮脸守尸还是啥东西，啥也守不住。第三把护士怨灵这种屠夫重做，也变成走地，这种屠夫完全无视地图板子和障碍，根本就不该存在。其实我就想了半天时间，屠夫难受无非就因为修机速度太快，人类难受无非就因为被守尸针对，你把这俩问题解决了，平衡性自然啥问题都没了。官方的6年还比不上我半天，我实在是觉得不可思议。

I recommend this game if you like personal triumph and matchmaking/teamwork action titles.
Does it make you feel good to help others, Heal them and support while reaching the goal?
(Don't be a selfish survivor)
Does it make you feel good to kill everyone, toy with them and watch them scurry like mice at your approach?
Then try it out! 20$ is a solid price for the base game - but if it's on sale? Just do it. So worth it.
Recently added to PS4 PSPlus and reignited my passion, Had to buy it on PC once and for all.

I had played a while back through gamesharing on steam, Way better on PC -
But I gotta admit, Mashing X instead of spacebar for quick commands and "The 2nd hook" is nice feeling.
Maybe play this one with a controller if it matches your playstyle more, I've chosen to adapt to the default PC controls, I'd like to think I'm getting better... lol anyways...

Oh, It's not really "Pay to win" - Don't let the DLC fool you, It's mostly for cosmetics and different characters... WHICH... aren't really "Better" than any others. It's a well balanced (enough) game. Even without all the DLC, you'll still have a great, full experience. (You can still play with DLC survivors/against DLC killers - DLC does not limit the matchmaking) - Speaking of Matchmaking...

My Three Faults for this game...
is that you can't stay in the lobby, you have to exit to the main character menu after every round. I find this time consuming, slightly annoying when I'm in the mood to "Go go go"

AND - That LAGGY KILLERS ARE CHEATERS... Why should I be dropped to their slowness? It just makes running away almost impossible, running into walls and "glitching" down hallways, failing skill checks... It's all effected by Lag, and not to the survivors benefits at all. Makes the whole round kind of pointless and frustrating. + DISCONNECTING PEOPLE are bad. Don't be elitist. Just play. - LASTLY on this one.. your item is still consumed if the killer just disconnects. wtf is that?

AND - the Killer queue is long AF on PC, it seems. I'm sure this fluxuates a bit, but I can wait a good 15 minutes on Huntress and still not even see a single person jump in the lobby. Sssooooo....
WTB Survivors? Its easy to kill, It's hard to be helpful. Takes real skill to outsmart killers :D (taunt) - ALSO- I understand if the "Ping" is bad or whatever, red, no good. but otherwise, man up n play. If you leave after getting hooked once or one person dies.. you suck as a gamer.

But that's really it... Overall, Damn well made 7/10  -Not something to No Life out on, but Almost worth doing so

Sur le fond, le jeux est bien, mais dans les faits, SEUL le TUEUR s'amuse. Les 4 survivants, eux, galèrent et meurent frustrés.... Car oui, dans ce jeux, c'est le Tueur qui décide si l'on s'amuse ou pas...

=> Mauvais équilibrages, certains Tueurs ont des compétences ABUSIVES, qui ne laissent aucune chance aux survivants.
=> De plus, les développeurs ont totalement favorisé les tueurs dans plusieurs phases du jeux (calcul des points & gain de rangs, selection des competences).
=> Mauvais états d'esprit de la plus part des tueurs, qui campent et abusent des persos broken pour farmer les survivants et obtenirs leurs points & rangs. Forcément, la conséquence est qu'une bonne partie des survivants se mettent eux aussi à Alt+F4 les games frustrantes (il y a des déconnections dans 1 game sur 2).
=> Le tueur est l'hôte de la game, donc lui n'a JAMAIS de lag! Mais vous SI !!! 
=> Impossible de débloquer tous les persos et toutes les compétences sans payer les DLC (autant survivants que tueurs)

=> Jouer à 5 potes (1 tueur & 4 survivants) est certainement très amusant. Mais en dehors de ça.....

Bref..... Un condensé de sel et de frustration....

Le principe du jeu est génial, mais du point de vue des survivants dans les faits c'est le tueur qui décide si l'on va s'amuser ou pas. Certains bugs et les problèmes de connexion du tueur sauront également entacher votre fun. Pour les connaisseurs je rajoute une petite ligne pour parler de "No One Escape Death" (NOED) qui est un atout de tueur qui dégrade le jeu de manière général alors que d'autres atouts comme "Barbecue & Chilli" sont eux complètement orientés dans la bonne direction à favoriser un gameplay bien loin du Face camping. Le manque de diversité des tueur ; dans le choix des atouts "viable" ainsi que le systeme de point qui n'est malheureusement pas parfait non plus, je conclurais en disant que dans l'ensemble les survivants s'amuseront 40% du temps. 

La partie tueur est quand à elle bien plus réussi même si vous serais vous aussi victime du manque de diversité des atouts, des problèmes de connexion des survivants, du système de point, de certain bug et des multiples ragequit des survivants un peut trop salés de leur games précédentes. 
le plus gros problème en tant que tueur est à mon sens la différence colossale entre affronter une squade de 4 survivants entraînés et organisés qui ne vous laisseront pratiquement aucune chance de gagner ou à l'inverse affronter une poignée de joueur indépendant qui ne peuvent pas communiquer et qui vont globalement faire n'importe quoi et ragequite à leur première mise au sol.

Mais même si je ne recommande pas ce jeu je conclurais quand même avec mes premiers mots, Le principe du jeu est génial.
